sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography';
import { Container, Grid, Button, InputLabel, FormControl,Select,Input } from '@material-ui/core';
import useStyles from "./styles"


const AdminActionButtons = () => {
    const classes = useStyles();
    
    return (
        <>
        <Grid container>
          <Grid item xs={4}>
            <Button className={classes.catbutton} variant="outlined" color="primary" onClick={handleClickOpenCategory}>
              <Typography>
                Add Category
                  </Typography>
            </Button>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={4}>
            <Button className={classes.catbutton} variant="outlined" color="primary" onClick={handleClickOpenProduct}>
              <Typography>
                Add Food
                  </Typography>
            </Button>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={4}>
            <Button className={classes.catbutton} variant="outlined" color="primary" onClick={handleClickOpenProduct}>
              <Typography>
                View Orders
                  </Typography>
            </Button>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
        </>
    )
}

export default AdminActionButtons
